1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\cache\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\controllers\Router;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\parser\ControllerParser;
8 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
10 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
11 use Ubiquity\controllers\di\DiManager;
12 
20 class RouterCacheTrait {
21 
22  abstract protected static function _getFiles(&$config, $type, $silent = false);
23 
24  private static function addControllerCache($classname) {
25  $parser = new ControllerParser ();
26  try {
27  $parser->parse ( $classname );
28  return $parser->asArray ();
29  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
30  // Nothing to do
31  }
32  return [ ];
33  }
34 
35  private static function initRouterCache(&$config, $silent = false) {
36  $routes = [ "rest" => [ ],"default" => [ ] ];
37  $files = self::getControllersFiles ( $config, $silent );
38  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
39  if (is_file ( $file )) {
40  $controller = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
41  $parser = new ControllerParser ();
42  try {
43  $parser->parse ( $controller );
44  $ret = $parser->asArray ();
45  $key = ($parser->isRest ()) ? "rest" : "default";
46  $routes [$key] = \array_merge ( $routes [$key], $ret );
47  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
48  // Nothing to do
49  }
50  }
51  }
52  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/routes.default", "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $routes ["default"], "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
53  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/routes.rest", "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $routes ["rest"], "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
54  DiManager::init($config);
55  if (! $silent) {
56  echo "Router cache reset\n";
57  }
58  }
59 
60  public static function storeDynamicRoutes($isRest = false) {
61  $routes = Router::getRoutes ();
62  $part = ($isRest) ? 'rest' : 'default';
63  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/routes." . $part, "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $routes, "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
64  }
65 
66  private static function storeRouteResponse($key, $response) {
67  self::setKeyExpired ( $key, false );
68  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/" . $key, $response, 'controllers', false );
69  return $response;
70  }
71 
72  private static function getRouteKey($routePath) {
73  if (is_array ( $routePath )) {
74  return "path" . \md5 ( \implode ( "", $routePath ) );
75  }
76  return "path" . \md5 ( Router::slashPath ( $routePath ) );
77  }
78 
84  public static function getControllerCache($isRest = false) {
85  $key = ($isRest) ? "rest" : "default";
86  if (self::$cache->exists ( "controllers/routes." . $key ))
87  return self::$cache->fetch ( "controllers/routes." . $key );
88  return [ ];
89  }
90 
91  public static function getRouteCache($routePath, $routeArray, $duration) {
92  $key = self::getRouteKey ( $routePath );
93 
94  if (self::$cache->exists ( "controllers/" . $key ) && ! self::expired ( $key, $duration )) {
95  $response = self::$cache->file_get_contents ( "controllers/" . $key );
96  return $response;
97  } else {
98  $response = Startup::runAsString ( $routeArray );
99  return self::storeRouteResponse ( $key, $response );
100  }
101  }
102 
103  protected static function expired($key, $duration) {
104  return self::$cache->expired ( "controllers/" . $key, $duration ) === true;
105  }
106 
107  public static function isExpired($routePath, $duration) {
108  return self::expired ( self::getRouteKey ( $routePath ), $duration );
109  }
110 
111  public static function setExpired($routePath) {
112  $key = self::getRouteKey ( $routePath );
113  if (self::$cache->exists ( "controllers/" . $key )) {
114  self::$cache->remove ( "controllers/" . $key );
115  }
116  }
117 
118  public static function setRouteCache($routePath) {
119  $key = self::getRouteKey ( $routePath );
120  $response = Startup::runAsString ( $routePath );
121  return self::storeRouteResponse ( $key, $response );
122  }
123 
124  public static function addAdminRoutes() {
125  self::addControllerCache ( "Ubiquity\controllers\Admin" );
126  }
127 
128  public static function getRoutes() {
129  $result = self::getControllerCache ();
130  return $result;
131  }
132 
133  public static function getControllerRoutes($controllerClass, $isRest = false) {
134  $result = [ ];
135  $ctrlCache = self::getControllerCache ( $isRest );
136  foreach ( $ctrlCache as $path => $routeAttributes ) {
137  if (isset ( $routeAttributes ["controller"] )) {
138  if ($routeAttributes ["controller"] === $controllerClass) {
139  $result [$path] = $routeAttributes;
140  }
141  } else {
142  $firstValue = current ( $routeAttributes );
143  if (isset ( $firstValue ) && isset ( $firstValue ["controller"] )) {
144  if ($firstValue ["controller"] === $controllerClass) {
145  $result [$path] = $routeAttributes;
146  }
147  }
148  }
149  }
150  return $result;
151  }
152 
153  public static function addRoute($path, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "") {
154  $controllerCache = self::getControllerCache ();
155  Router::addRouteToRoutes ( $controllerCache, $path, $controller, $action, $methods, $name );
156  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/routes.default", "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $controllerCache, "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
157  }
158 
159  public static function addRoutes($pathArray, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "") {
160  self::addRoutes_ ( $pathArray, $controller, $action, $methods, $name, false );
161  }
162 
163  public static function addRestRoutes($pathArray, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "") {
164  self::addRoutes_ ( $pathArray, $controller, $action, $methods, $name, true );
165  }
166 
167  private static function addRoutes_($pathArray, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "", $isRest = false) {
168  $controllerCache = self::getControllerCache ( $isRest );
169  $postfix = "default";
170  if ($isRest) {
171  $postfix = "rest";
172  }
173  Router::addRoutesToRoutes ( $controllerCache, $pathArray, $controller, $action, $methods, $name );
174  self::$cache->store ( "controllers/routes." . $postfix, "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $controllerCache, "array" ) . ";", 'controllers' );
175  }
176 
177  public static function getControllersFiles(&$config, $silent = false) {
178  return self::_getFiles ( $config, "controllers", $silent );
179  }
180 
181  public static function getControllers($subClass = "\\Ubiquity\\controllers\\Controller", $backslash = false, $includeSubclass = false,$includeAbstract=false) {
182  $result = [ ];
183  if ($includeSubclass) {
184  $result [] = $subClass;
185  }
186  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
187  $files = self::getControllersFiles ( $config, true );
188  try {
189  $restCtrls = CacheManager::getRestCache ();
190  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
191  $restCtrls = [ ];
192  }
193  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
194  if (is_file ( $file )) {
195  $controllerClass = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file, $backslash );
196  if (isset ( $restCtrls [$controllerClass] ) === false) {
197  $r = new \ReflectionClass ( $controllerClass );
198  if ($r->isSubclassOf ( $subClass ) && ($includeAbstract || ! $r->isAbstract ())) {
199  $result [] = $controllerClass;
200  }
201  }
202  }
203  }
204  return $result;
205  }
206 }
